title: Hospital Sign In, First Operation Shocked the Nation
author: Unknown
synopsis:
Qin Feng is a medical intern at Municipal First Hospital who possesses a mysterious sign-in system that grants him extraordinary medical knowledge and skills. Each day he signs in at different locations in the hospital, unlocking abilities that would take ordinary doctors decades to master.

From emergency surgeries to rare disease diagnoses, Qin Feng's talents quickly make him a rising star in Jiang City's medical community. But his skills aren't just for show—he uses them to save lives that others have given up on, from accident victims to terminal patients.

As his reputation grows, so do the challenges. Complex cases, hospital politics, and his growing relationship with the beautiful Liu Yan'er all test his resolve. But for Qin Feng, medicine isn't about fame or fortune—it's about the sacred duty to heal.

When a young leukemia patient named Xiaoxia runs away, believing herself a burden to her family, Qin Feng races against time to bring her back. Little does he know that fate has an unexpected twist in store—one that will bind his life to hers in ways he never imagined.
